text: aqra -'ayaha alnabi- ma 'unzl 'iilayk min alquran muftatihana biasm rabik almutafarid bialkhalqi, aladhi khalaq kla 'iinsan min qiteat dama ghaliz 'ahmara. aqra -'ayaha alnabi- ma 'unzl 'iilayka, wa'iina rabak likathir al'iihsan wasie aljawdi, aladhi ellam khalaqah alkitabat bialqulma, ellam al'iinsan ma lam yakun yaelimu, wanaqlih min zulmat aljahl 'iilaa nur aleilmi
